alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 10 at 2:06PM MDT until October 11 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River and Animas River Basin. In Utah, Southeast Utah. * WHEN...From noon to 7 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River
